data.message:
Great — happy to help. What would you like to test? A few things I can help with quickly:

- Responding to messages / conversation flow
- Running code snippets or explaining results
- Inspecting files or running shell commands (I can access the workspace)
- Applying patches or editing files
- Searching the repo for text or filenames
- Viewing or validating images

Tell me which test you want to run or give me an instruction and I’ll execute it.
